definition[0]: to make a book, list, record etc, using different pieces of information, music etc
example[0]: The document was compiled by the Department of Health
example[1]: The report was compiled from a survey of 5,000 households.
definition[1]: to put a set of instructions into a computer in a form that it can understand and use
definition[2]: to collect information together and write it into a list, report, book etc
example[2]: Our staff are compiling the material for an on-line database.
definition[3]: to put instructions into a computer in a form that the computer can understand and use
example[3]: You do not have to exit the editor, compile the program, run the program, then reload the editor to fix any bugs.
